EfficientRead is a simple browser extension that shows the remaining reading time based on your current position on the page.

Key Features:

	•	Displays the remaining reading time depending on where you are in the text.
	•	Fast and accurate calculation based on the length of the content and your progress.
	•	Time updates as you scroll, helping you better manage your reading.
        •	Adjustable reading speed.
        
        

Privacy:

	•	Your reading data stays on your device, and no information is sent to external servers.

EfficientRead helps you manage your reading time more effectively when browsing articles and web pages.

This version focuses on the core feature: showing the remaining reading time.
